TopicTitle: PSA: The default web client for #KSPOfficial has changed

Articles.Content:
Over this past weekend some sort of incompatibility arose between the esper IRC network and the kiwi IRC webclient used in the link at the top of each forum page, preventing users from being able to connect.

We've now changed the link to use esper's webclient instead, so all should be functional now.

Apologies to anyone who was unable to connect for their #kspofficial fix over the weekend.

Good to know. Only issue is that it's kind of annoying to the eyes how the screen goes from black to white. I'm certain this is nothing Squad or the Moderator Group can do, and is rather a technical end of the IRC itself. The likely fix is me getting a proper client, but I feel the link above is just too simple a solution.
Color scheme on the esper webclient is adjustable in the options, you should be able to find something that is easy on the eyes. Click the little "Menu" square at upper left and play around a bit.

5 hours ago, Red Iron Crown said:

Color scheme on the esper webclient is adjustable in the options, you should be able to find something that is easy on the eyes. Click the little "Menu" square at upper left and play around a bit. 

Ooo! Thanks Red!
